TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed UninstallAction extends System.Enum

summary.span: Especifica lo que debe hacer un instalador durante una operación de desinstalación.

span.span: Specifies what an installer should do during an uninstallation.

remarks.format: ## Examples El ejemplo siguiente crea un desinstalador personalizado que herede la clase.The following sample creates a custom uninstaller that inherits the class. En el invalidado función, el enumeración se determina según proporcionados por el usuario.In the overridden function, the enumeration is set based on user input. Si la entrada es "n", el programa de desinstalación personalizado no realizar ninguna acción en el recurso en el registro de eventos especificado por el usuario.If the input is "n", the custom uninstaller will not take any action on the resource in the event log entered by the user. En caso contrario, quitará el recurso del registro de eventos.Otherwise, it will remove the resource from the event log. [!code-cpp[UninstallAction_NoAction_Remove_3#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/UninstallAction_NoAction_Remove_3/CPP/uninstallaction_noaction_remove_3.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[UninstallAction_NoAction_Remove_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/UninstallAction_NoAction_Remove_3/CS/uninstallaction_noaction_remove_3.cs#1)] [!code-vb[UninstallAction_NoAction_Remove_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/UninstallAction_NoAction_Remove_3/VB/uninstallaction_noaction_remove_3.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Configuration.Install.UninstallAction NoAction = int32(1)

summary.span: No modifica el recurso creado por el instalador.

span.span: Leaves the resource created by the installer as is.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Configuration.Install.UninstallAction Remove = int32(0)

summary.span: Quita el recurso creado por el instalador.

span.span: Removes the resource the installer created.
